p: Resveratrol exerted its anti-inflammatory effects through the down-regulation of pro-inflammatory cytokines, and inhibition of COX-2 and prostaglandin expression [ 126]. In addition, it lowered the expression of ICAM1, suppressed MCP1, and inhibited NF-ÎºB/TLR-4 p65/MAPKs signaling cascade [ 127]. The suppression of COX-2 and aromatase in ectopic endometrial areas seems to be essential for the alleviation of endometriosis-related chronic pelvic pain. In addition to this ability possessed by resveratrol, it can also block SIRT 1 and TGF-beta genes [ 128].
